title: 5.7 patch 170+ ping after a few games
body: I have never had lagg issues except when there are problems with the server, however after a few urf games I decided to take a break and after a couple of hours, i tried playing an URF game and when I got into game i had ping that ranged roughly around 170 - 240s and I usually get pings between 35 - 38. I have done everything I can on my part in terms of restarting client to computer to modem. Please let me know if you guys are facing a similar issue to mine or any possible solutions to fix this problem.

replies.body:
are you guys all optus?? out of my 5 man premade - only 3 people with consistent 150+ ping simultaneously, were with optus. 

maybe optus cannot handle netflix or something...
I'm on Optus and I'm perfectly fine.
Yeah i keep getting massive ping spikes, and some connection lost error in the loading screen.
If you're losing your connection, then it's probably something more severe. Have you made a support ticket about it yet?
Are you sure that all other applications are closed while you are playing League?
